1128980.name: Banana 2: Fruit
1128980.description:
Calling all clicker connoisseurs! Strap on your clicking finger and get ready to go ape for Banana 2: Fruit!

Features:
-each click gives you points you can use to get banana bunches
-a variety of bananas, colors and effects with different rarities in each bunch
-inventory drops every 2 hours of AFK playing
-an ever growing amount of banana types to collect

This simple clicker game puts you in charge of the ultimate banana bonanza. Click that virtual banana with all your might, and watch the points pile up.

As you rack up points, you can unlock bunches of bananas – and these aren't your average grocery store finds! Each bunch is a unique collectible, randomly generated with a variety of rarities, colors, styles, and sometimes even special effects! These get tossed into your inventory. Try to collect them all!

Here's the cherry on top: every 3 hours you play, you'll receive a free bunch of bananas, adding to your ever-growing collection.

Embark on a delightfully click-tastic adventure! Will you become the ultimate banana baron? There's only one way to find out!
